Description: Unparalleled views of the water on one side and city on the other, this community is truly one of a kind. Steps to the beach and waterfront as well as a quick walk to Castle Island, this location offers peaceful respite from the hustle and bustle of the city. Walk two blocks in the other direction and you find yourself amongst some of the best restaurants and bars in Boston. *1 Month Broker Fee*, **All showings require 24 hour notice**
